text: The Hoobs is a 2001-03 British/Canadian Children's educational television series co-produced by British Animation Studio Jim Henson Television (UK) and Canadian Studio Decode Entertainment (Canada) In Association With Channel 4 (UK) and TVOnartio (Canada) and It aired broadcasting from PBS Kids Sprout on December 25, 2006 to until August 23, 2009 ==Episodes== *Season 1 (January 15, 2001 - February 3, 2001 (UK), December 25, 2006 - January 1, 2007 (USA)) *Season 2 (May 5, 2001 - June 6, 2001 (UK), December 25, 2006 - January 1, 2007 (USA)) *Season 3 (June 14, 2001 - November 27, 2001 (UK), December 25, 2006 - January 1, 2007 (USA)) *Season 4 (December 22, 2001 - April 1, 2002 (UK), December 25, 2006 - January 1, 2007 (USA)) *Season 5 (September 23, 2002 - January 3, 2003 (UK), December 25, 2006 (USA)) ==List of Live Show Appearances== * Nick Jr. Live (April 10-25, 2002 (UK)) Category:2000s children's television series Category:2003 Canadian television series endings Category:British television series Category:Canadian television series
title: The Hoobs
